report.title: Very Real
report.author: PluggedWisdom
report.bodytext: This is the first smoking mix that I've tried that comes close to the real cannabis resin experience, and I've smoked a lot. /n /n Very subtle to start. Within 30 min graduates to a heavy indica type smoke - drowsy, chilled. Within 1 hour this is surpassed by a 'Leb Red' type high & euphoria. Very nice. /n No hangover but touch expensive and on reflextion I should made it 1g a joint to spread it out more. /n /n Overall I rate it very good.
